messages.message:
We've been seeing a lot of CI failures where the bazel rules are failing to download cc @Cody Boggs
```
[2025-08-11T23:06:27.127Z] RUNTEST OUTPUT: INFO: Invocation ID: 92a994c6-5fba-4f28-b844-b09353bfd263
[2025-08-11T23:06:27.127Z] Loading: 
[2025-08-11T23:06:27.127Z] WARNING: Download from https://mirror.bazel.build/github.com/bazelbuild/rules_pkg/releases/download/1.1.0/rules_pkg-1.1.0.tar.gz failed: class java.io.FileNotFoundException GET returned 404 Not Found
[2025-08-11T23:06:27.127Z] Loading: 
[2025-08-11T23:06:27.127Z] Loading: 0 packages loaded```
Is the non-mirror download failing too?
We should probably remove the mirror regardless.
Non-mirror link seems to still be up.

Okie doke.
The failing mirrors usually shouldn't cause the build to fail, but if it's consistently bailing on 404 then there's not much hope for it to suddenly work. lol

Feel free to drop it if it's causing issues
